But when i mount these and try to add the language level, it says Update Required, and just goes back to home.  Im really desperate to use this, PLEASE HELP! ramorris2008@yahoo.com

@ramro2002
Chances are you need a newer version of RS to run these programs (like with the 4&5 levels of languages).  I suggest going to something newer. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5210152/Rosetta_Stone_3.4.5___Crack(VasiaZozulia)  This one (looking through the comments, as I'm just downloading it now)  seems to run German 4&5, so it should be able to run these.  Other than that, I don't know what to suggest.  (Also, make sure to completely unistall your RS before loading this one.)
